title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.20 - Application of substances to boxers between rounds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.20 - Application of substances to boxers between rounds

State Regulations

All substances applied to or into the body of a boxer between
rounds shall be approved in advance by the Commission. No substance not so
approved by the Commission shall be applied to or into the body of a boxer
between rounds. Notes

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
